item.title: 西班牙 HBX 公司因贸易不确定性和美元走弱下调全年业绩指引
item.description: 西班牙旅游技术公司 HBX 集团周三表示，受宏观经济背景和美元走弱的影响，该公司将修改全年指导计划。【原文：Spanish travel technology firm HBX Group said on Wednesday it was revising its full-year guidance as a result of the macroeconomic backdrop and a weaker U.S. dollar.】

item.title: Meta公司因WhatsApp上的人工智能工具面临意大利调查
item.description: 意大利反垄断机构周三表示，已开始调查 Meta 公司在 Whatsapp 消息应用程序中安装人工智能工具时涉嫌滥用支配地位的行为。【原文：Italy's antitrust authority said on Wednesday it had opened a probe into Meta for allegedly abusing its dominant position when installing its AI tool on Whatsapp messaging app.】

item.title: 力拓上半年利润为五年来最小
item.description: 力拓（Rio Tinto）周三公布了五年来最小的上半年基本利润，原因是铁矿石价格因供应过剩和中国需求疲软而持续低迷，抵消了铜业务带来的较高收益。【原文：Rio Tinto , reported its smallest first-half underlying profit in five years on Wednesday, as iron ore prices remained subdued due to oversupply concerns and soft China demand, offsetting higher earnings from its copper business.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁因关税干扰对年度利润发出警告
item.description: 由于美国关税 "不断变化且具有破坏性"，豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）周三下调了利润预期，并表示目前预计调整后的营业利润将大致达到收支平衡。【原文：Luxury carmaker Aston Martin lowered its profit view on Wednesday due to "evolving and disruptive" U.S. tariffs, and said it now expects adjusted operating profit to roughly break even.】

item.title: 特朗普关税让加拿大和墨西哥的巧克力制造商比美国公司更具优势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收贸易关税的目的是促进国内制造业的发展。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's trade tariffs are meant to boost domestic manufacturing.】

item.title: 爱马仕销售额增长，美国价格涨幅比其他地区高 5
item.description: 伯金包制造商爱马仕（Hermes）周三公布的季度销售额增长了 9%，超过了竞争对手，这表明富裕的购物者对这家法国公司梦寐以求的价值 10,000 美元的手袋的持续追捧。【原文：Birkin bag maker Hermes outpaced rivals with a 9% rise in quarterly sales reported on Wednesday, showing continued appetite from rich shoppers for the French company's coveted, $10,000 handbags.】

item.title: 关税 "风暴 "再添挑战，保时捷下调业绩展望
item.description: 在欧盟与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）达成贸易协议后，大众汽车旗下陷入困境的豪华品牌保时捷周三下调了全年盈利目标，并报告称上半年因关税造成了4亿欧元（约合4.62亿美元）的损失。【原文：Volkswagen's embattled luxury brand Porsche cut its full-year profitability target on Wednesday after the EU's trade deal with U.S. President Donald Trump and reported a 400-million-euro ($462 million) hit from tariffs in the first half.】

item.title: 西班牙电信第二季度因汇率波动净亏损 5900 万美元
item.description: 西班牙电信巨头 Telefonica 第二季度净亏损 5100 万欧元（5893 万美元），原因是汇率波动和拉丁美洲出售资产的资本减值。【原文：Spanish telecom giant Telefonica booked a net loss of 51 million euros ($58.93 million) in the second quarter due to currency swings and capital impairments on assets sold in Latin America.】

item.title: 受汇率影响，兰博基尼半年营业利润下滑
item.description: 意大利豪华跑车制造商兰博基尼周三表示，由于汇率影响，上半年营业收入略有下降，即使向客户交付了创纪录数量的汽车。【原文：Italian luxury sports car maker Lamborghini said on Wednesday its operating income fell slightly in the first half even as it delivered record numbers of cars to customers, as currency effects weighed on its bottom line.】

item.title: 富士康将于周三与东元电机举行新闻发布会
item.description: 台湾富士康表示，将于本周三下午3:30（格林尼治标准时间7:30）与台湾工业电机制造商东元电机举行新闻发布会。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn said it will hold a press conference with Taiwanese industry motor maker TECO Electric & Machinery at 3:30 p.m. (0730 GMT) on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚将提高加密货币交易税率
item.description: 根据财政部的一项新规定，印度尼西亚将从 8 月 1 日起提高加密货币交易税，对海外交易所托管的交易征收更高的税率。【原文：Indonesia will raise taxes on cryptocurrency transactions, with a higher rate on trades hosted by overseas bourses, starting from August 1, according to a new finance ministry regulation.】

item.title: 中国需求强劲助达能第二季度销售额超预期
item.description: 达能周三公布的第二季度销售额超出预期，主要得益于中国市场对婴儿配方奶粉和医疗营养产品的强劲需求，但抵消了美国市场竞争激烈导致咖啡奶精销售疲软的影响。【原文：Danone on Wednesday reported second-quarter sales that beat expectations, boosted by strong demand in China for infant milk formula and medical nutrition products, offsetting weakness in coffee creamers amid a competitive U.S. market.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯第二季度关税受挫，成本增加
item.description: 德国运动服制造商阿迪达斯（Adidas）周三表示，该公司第二季度受到美国关税的影响达两位数欧元。【原文：German sportswear maker Adidas on Wednesday said that it saw an impact in the double-digit euro millions from U.S. tariffs in the second quarter.】

item.title: 凯捷进入不确定的第三季度，收窄全年业绩指引
item.description: 法国IT咨询公司凯捷（Capgemini）周三收窄了本财年的业绩指导，理由是尽管上半年业绩表现良好，但在不确定的经济形势下，公司仍需谨慎行事。【原文：French IT consulting firm Capgemini narrowed its guidance for the current financial year on Wednesday, citing caution in an uncertain economic context despite a resilient performance in the first half of the hear.】

item.title: Wordline 预测 2025 年有机收入将下降
item.description: 法国数字支付公司 Worldline 周三表示，在经历了 "充满挑战 "的上半年之后，预计 2025 年的有机收入将出现低个位数百分比的下降。【原文：Worldline expects a low single-digit percentage decline in organic revenue during 2025 following a "challenging" first half, the French digital payments company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰预计今年利润率为 4% 至 6
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）在首次评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与欧盟的贸易战所造成的损失时表示，预计其汽车业务今年的利润率为 4% 至 6%。【原文：Mercedes-Benz expects a profit margin of 4% to 6% this year for its car business, the automaker said in its first assessment of the damage from U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war with the European Union.】

item.title: 瑞银集团第二季度盈利 24 亿美元，超出预期
item.description: 瑞银集团周三表示，由于市场动荡推动了交易活动，第二季度利润比去年同期增长了一倍多。【原文：UBS said on Wednesday that second-quarter profit more than doubled from a year earlier as market turmoil drove trading activity.】

item.title: 早安本周不再睡觉
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特（Gregor Stuart Hunter）展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter:】

item.title: 丰田汽车 1-6 月全球产销量创历史新高
item.description: 丰田公司周三表示，在北美、日本和中国等市场强劲需求的推动下，该公司今年前六个月的全球产销量创下历史新高。【原文：Toyota said on Wednesday its worldwide output and sales reached record highs for the first six months of the year, fuelled by strong demand in markets including North America, Japan and China.】

item.title: 汇丰银行上半年利润下降 26%，低于预期
item.description: 汇丰控股周三公布的上半年税前利润下滑 26%，不及分析师预期，原因是对交通银行的投资减值 21 亿美元。【原文：HSBC Holdings reported a 26% slide in first-half pretax profit on Wednesday, missing analyst estimates, as a $2.1 billion impairment from its investment in Bank of Communications weighed.】

item.title: 恒大面临退市，中国房地产债务重整步履维艰
item.description: 中国恒大集团（China Evergrande Group）因未能重整债务而被迫清盘，下个月将被踢出香港交易所。【原文：China Evergrande Group looks set to be kicked off the Hong Kong exchange next month after failing to revamp its debt and being pushed into liquidation, with the stubbornly weak Chinese property sector clouding the outlook for debt restructuring by its peers.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经济增长可能出现反弹，但基本细节薄弱
item.description: 随着进口流量的减少，美国第二季度的经济增长可能会出现反弹，但预计消费者支出将温和增长，而企业设备投资将停滞不前，这将严重夸大经济的健康状况。【原文：U.S. economic growth likely rebounded in the second quarter as the flow of imports subsided, but with consumer spending anticipated to have increased moderately and business investment in equipment stalled that would grossly exaggerate the economy's health.】

item.title: 现代汽车集团郑会长赴美支持韩国贸易谈判 - Yonhap
item.description: 据韩联社报道，现代汽车集团执行董事长郑义宣将于周三前往华盛顿，支持韩国推动与美国达成贸易协议。【原文：Hyundai Motor Group Executive Chair Euisun Chung will travel to Washington on Wednesday to support South Korea's push for a trade deal with the United States, the Yonhap news agency reported.】

item.title: 消息人士称台湾贸易代表团将赴美继续关税谈判
item.description: 四位熟悉内情的人士周三告诉路透社，台湾贸易代表团将继续在华盛顿与美国就关税问题进行谈判。【原文：A Taiwan trade delegation will continue talks with the United States on tariffs in Washington, four people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市持稳，投资者为关税最后期限和美联储做准备
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市小幅上涨，投资者在中美贸易谈判结束但未达成任何实质性协议后以及美联储宣布政策前持谨慎态度。【原文：Asian stocks rose modestly on Wednesday, with investors cautious after trade talks between the U.S. and China ended without any substantive agreement and ahead of the Federal Reserve's policy announcement.】

item.title: Dye & Durham 考虑出售或合并，与投资者 Plantro 达成停战协议
item.description: Dye & Durham 公司周二表示，将审查战略替代方案，以稳定财务状况，甚至可能考虑出售自己，该公司与第二大投资者 Plantro 公司达成和解，避免了代理权争夺战。【原文：Dye & Durham will review strategic alternatives to stabilize its finances and may even consider selling itself, it said on Tuesday, reaching a settlement that avoids a proxy fight with its second-largest investor, Plantro.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第二季度通胀率意外偏低，预示着将降息
item.description: 周三的数据显示，澳大利亚6月份消费者物价增速为四年多来最慢，核心通胀率创下三年新低，巩固了市场对下月降息的预期。【原文：Australian consumer prices grew at the slowest pace in over four years in the June quarter, data showed on Wednesday, while core inflation hit a fresh three-year low and cemented market wagers for a cut in interest rates next month.】

item.title: 特朗普通俄最后通牒引发油价大涨后保持稳定
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）向莫斯科提出缩短结束乌克兰战争的最后期限后，潜在的供应短缺问题成为焦点，油价在周三早盘交易中上扬。【原文：Oil prices ticked up in early trading on Wednesday after rising more than 3% in the previous session as potential supply shortages came into focus after U.S. President Donald Trump gave Moscow an abbreviated deadline toward ending the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，LG 能源解决方案公司与特斯拉签署了价值 43 亿美元的电池供应协议
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周三表示，韩国电池制造商 LG Energy Solution (LGES) 已经签署了一份价值 43 亿美元的合同，为特斯拉提供用于储能系统的磷酸铁锂电池。【原文：South Korean battery maker LG Energy Solution (LGES) has signed a $4.3 billion contract to supply Tesla with lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries for energy storage systems, a person familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贸易协议达成后欧元徘徊在一个月低点附近，焦点转向美联储
item.description: 欧元周三在一个月来的最低点附近企稳，本周跌幅巨大，原因是投资者计算了美国-欧盟贸易协定的成本，并对美联储和日本央行的政策会议进行了展望。【原文：The euro steadied near its lowest in a month on Wednesday, nursing steep losses this week as investors counted the cost of the U.S.-EU trade pact and looked ahead to policy meetings from the Federal Reserve and the Bank of Japan.】
